name: After Coffee
description: This Campari-based drink from Toby Maloney of The Violet Hour in Chicago is a super-bitter cocktail designed to wake up your taste buds after a big meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine Campari, vermouth, rum, and Fernet Branca in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir until well chilled, about 15 seconds.
Strain into a rocks glass over a large piece of ice. Garnish with fresh mint.
